#summary ctrl_*->process_mode_*()
#labels Phase-Implementation,controllerfunctions

= Description =
process_mode() calls the process_mode_`$_REQUEST[mode]`() function if existing, it will pass an argument, $gpc, which is the compacted values of $mode_gpc_`$_REQUEST[mode]`

= Code Hierarchy =
 * executed in: ctrl->process_data()
 * executes: ctrl->process_mode_* functions
